name: Witch Hunt - Halloween 2017
description:
Go on a Witch Hunt this Halloween and see how many pumpkins you can dodge in this spooky halloween flying game.

Free endless witch flying action - simply tap to fly and avoid the spooky floating pumpkins.

Compete worldwide for the most Spook-tactular high-score.

Ghooly graphics and haunting sounds for an extra scary halloween!

Happy Halloween 2017!
